name: Bhanuka Rajapaksa
bio: Pramod Bhanuka Bandara Rajapaksa, popularly known as Bhanuka Rajapaksa (born 24 October 1991), is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer, who plays limited over internationals for the national team. He is a left-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium.[1] He was born in Colombo. Despite a prolific domestic career, Rajapaksa only made his international debut when he was called up for the T20I series against Pakistan in 2019, ten years after his first-class debut.
